name: @FS_roi_label
author: FreeSurfer
description: Tool to get labels associated with FreeSurfer's parcellation and annotation files.

inputs.description: Integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's parcellation.
inputs.name: Label integer

inputs.description: Return the name of an integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's parcellation.
inputs.name: Label flag

inputs.description: Return the name of ranked integer labeled area from the output of 3dRank or 3dmerge -1rank.
inputs.name: Rank integer

inputs.description: Path to the rank map file.
inputs.name: Rank map file

inputs.description: Return entries matching NAME (case insensitive, partial match) from FreeSurfer's FreeSurferColorLUT.txt.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: Path to the label table file.
inputs.name: Label table file

inputs.description: CMAP file output by FSread_annot's -roi_1D option.
inputs.name: Surface annotation CMAP

inputs.description: Return the name of an integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's surface-based annotation.
inputs.name: Surface label integer

inputs.description: Return the entries matching NAME (case insensitive, partial match) from the CMAP file.
inputs.name: Surface name
